modules.title: Introduction to Python
learning_objectives: Understand what Python is and its applications
Set up a Python development environment

modules.title: Basic Python Syntax
learning_objectives: Learn about variables and data types
Write simple Python statements

modules.title: Control Structures
learning_objectives: Understand and use conditional statements
Implement loops in Python

modules.title: Functions in Python
learning_objectives: Define and call functions
Understand function parameters and return values

modules.title: Data Structures: Lists and Tuples
learning_objectives: Learn how to use lists and tuples
Manipulate data using list methods

modules.title: Data Structures: Dictionaries and Sets
learning_objectives: Understand dictionaries and sets
Perform operations on dictionaries and sets

modules.title: Introduction to Problem Solving
learning_objectives: Learn problem-solving techniques
Apply Python to solve simple problems

modules.title: Competitive Programming Basics
learning_objectives: Understand the basics of competitive programming
Write Python code to solve competitive programming problems

modules.title: Introduction to Data Analysis
learning_objectives: Understand the importance of data analysis
Learn to use libraries like Pandas

modules.title: Data Manipulation with Pandas
learning_objectives: Perform data manipulation using Pandas
Analyze datasets with basic operations

modules.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
learning_objectives: Understand what artificial intelligence is
Learn about its applications in Python

modules.title: Basic Machine Learning Concepts
learning_objectives: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning
Implement a simple machine learning model in Python
